text: geulihayeo geudeul-ui junimkkeseo geudeul-ege eungdabhasyeoss-euni : "sillo naneun geudaedeul jung namjadeun yeojadeun (seonhaeng-eul) silcheonhaneun jaui eotteohan haeng-wido jeobeoliji anh-eul geos-ila. geudaedeul-eun seologa ilbula. geuleoni ijuleul danhaenghago jasin-ui geojujieseo chubangdoemyeo naui gil-eseo haeleul ibgo ssaugo salhaedanghan jadeul-eun jinsillo naega geudeul-eul wihae geudeul-ui aghaeng-eul yongseohae jul geos-imyeo jinsillo naneun geudeul-eul alaelobuteo gangdeul-i heuleuneun cheongug-e deulge hal geos-ini, hananim-egeseo on bosang-ila.‚Äù hananim geubunkkeneun hullyunghan bosang-i issnola
